title: Add 'devansh shukla 6B AF PANCHWATI' to front page

requirements.summary: Add the text 'devansh shukla 6B AF PANCHWATI' prominently to the LawsPage above the laws list
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'devansh shukla 6B AF PANCHWATI' is displayed on the front page (LawsPage)
The text is clearly visible and positioned prominently
The text styling is consistent with the app's burgundy and gold legal theme

file_operations.description: Add a prominent text section displaying 'devansh shukla 6B AF PANCHWATI' above the LawList component. Style the text using the existing burgundy and gold theme colors (text-burgundy-700 or text-gold-600) with appropriate sizing (text-2xl or text-3xl) and spacing (mb-6 or mb-8). Position it after the page header but before the LawList component to ensure visibility. Preserve all existing layout structure and laws list functionality.
